definition[0]: if something is transparent, you can see through it
definition[1]: language or information that is transparent is clear and easy to understand
example[1]: The way the system works will be transparent to the user.
definition[2]: a lie, excuse etc that is transparent does not deceive people
definition[3]: if rules, methods, or business dealings are transparent, they are clear and people can see that they are fair and honest
example[2]: The trade agreement between Japan and the US is more transparent, and there are no secret documents.
example[3]: The regulations will force large corporations to conduct their contract awardsin a transparent manner.
